original_text: And King Ahaz cut off the frames of the stands and removed the basin from them, and he took down the sea from off the bronze oxen that were under it and put it on a stone pedestal.
korean_text: 아하스 왕이 물두멍 받침의 옆판을 떼내고 물두멍을 그 자리에서 옮기고 또 놋바다를 놋소 위에서 내려다가 돌판 위에 그것을 두며

sentences.original_text: And King Ahaz cut off the frames of the stands
and removed the basin from them
and he took down the sea
from off the bronze oxen that were under it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아래 있던 놋소 등에서 내려와

sentences.original_text: and put it on a stone pedestal
